name: Forward Lunge
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Engage core and maintain upright posture
Hands on hips or at sides for balance
steps: Step forward with one leg into lunge position
Lower hips until both knees are at 90°
Keep front knee over ankle, back knee toward floor
Push through front heel to return to start
cues: Push through front heel to return
mistakes: Pushing off back toe instead of front heel
safety: Control the descent. If knees hurt, reduce depth or try reverse lunge instead.

prescriptionHints.load: Bodyweight to start, add dumbbells as appropriate

joints.notes: Keep front knee aligned over ankle. Control descent to protect knees.
